1388000.name: Fantasy Grounds - Devin Night Token Pack 142: Nasty Beasts
1388000.description:
Devin Night Token Pack 142: Nasty Beasts

Not every battle is a fight worthy of a bard's lyrical immortalization, but every ruin and dark forest needs its share of deadly dangers. This pack delivers a variety of 51 nasty beasts, spiders, skeletons, kobolds, rat men, and more! Grab this pack and fill your dungeons with denizens to test your adventuring parties mettle!
This product contains:
  • Cyclopian Lich
  • Dark Dwarf Bow
  • Dark Dwarf Sword
  • Dark Dwarf
  • 2 Deathknights
  • Harpy Stormwitch
  • Imp Mischievous
  • Kobold Green Chief
  • Kobold Green Fighter
  • Kobold Necromancer
  • Rat Armored Grenadier
  • Rat Bear
  • Rat Brawler
  • Rat Grenadier
  • Rat Ogre
  • Rat Sage
  • Rate Slaver
  • Skeleton Archer Metallic
  • Skeleton Metallic
  • Skeleton Warrior Metallic
  • 2 Spider Dead
  • Spider Huntsman
  • Spider Jumping
  • Spider Recluse
  • Spider Red Banded
  • Spider Spitting
  • Spider Swarm
  • Spider Tarantula
  • Spider Tiger
  • Spider Trapdoor
  • Spider Wolf
  • Spider Hole
  • 11 Spiderwebbed
  • Thoul
  • Were Bear
  • Were Boar
  • Were Tiger
  • Were Wolf
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:  
James Holloway
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset. Compatible with Fantasy Grounds Unity
